item.title: Employee Portal
item.description: Most of the information in a payroll comes from your employee and goes back out to them in the form of payslips and T14 reports. So we thought why not just give them access to it directly. That’s where the idea of the Employee Portal comes in.

item.title: The Right Level of Detail
item.description: There is a constant temptation to specify everything while assigning a task. This seems to make sense so everyone is on the same page, but if you believe in hiring people who know more than you, then these two ideas can come into conflict. Maybe the solution is to tell people less.
